stimulusHtml: The broader changes in European lifestyles illustrated by the table led most directly to which of the following?

features.html:
CONSUMER DURABLES IN COMMUNIST BULGARIA PER 100 HOUSEHOLDS: 1965 AND 1983

19651983
Radios5992
Televisions887
Electric washing machines2381
Refrigerators588
Private cars234
Source: Adapted from Kristen Ghodsee, “Red Nostalgia? Communism, Women’s Emancipation, and Economic Transformation in Bulgaria,” European Journal of Feminist History, 2004. http://scholar.harvard.edu/files/kristenghodsee/files/lhomme-1-2004-ghodsee.pdf

choicesHtml: Increased support for socialism within the Soviet bloc
The reassertion of traditional gender roles
Growth in the criticism of materialism by youths and intellectuals
Greater wariness of and hostility toward immigrants from outside Europe
